subject: Order #SSN1771 – Delay in Express Shipping
description_text:
Hello SIMSONN team, 
 
 I placed an order on June 17, 2025 (Order #SSN1771) and selected Express Shipping (paid $59.90 USD, with a stated delivery time of 6 to 12 days). 
 
 However, as of today, the tracking status still shows “Shipment Information Received” since June 19, with no updates or actual movement from YunExpress. 
 
 Given the elapsed time and the express shipping option, I’d like to know if the package has been physically handed over to the carrier and when I can expect tracking updates. 
 
 Thank you in advance for your assistance. I look forward to your response. 
 
 Order details for reference: 
 
 
 Name: Sebastião de Sena Ferreira 
 Email: sebastiaosf@icloud.com 
 Order number: #SSN1771 
 Tracking number: YT2517000705760363

Dear SIMSONN team, 
 
 I hope this message finds you well. 
 
 I’m writing to follow up on my order #SSN1771, placed on June 17, for the VAM Pro units and controller, with Express Shipping selected (USD $59.90), which stated a delivery window of 6 to 12 business days. 
 
 Despite your reply on July 1st, informing me that the first batch was depleted and that the second batch would be shipped “tomorrow”, I regret to inform you that as of today, July 9, the tracking status still shows “Processing”, with no shipment confirmation or movement. 
 
 To recap: 
 
 
 The order was placed 23 days ago. 
 The shipping carrier (YunExpress) still shows “Shipment Information Received” since June 19, but no physical handover. 
 A support ticket was opened on June 27, and I’ve received no concrete update since then. 
 Meanwhile, I even received an automatic review request, despite the fact that my order hasn’t shipped. 
 
 
 
 This situation is extremely disappointing. If the product was not in stock, it should not have been listed as available, especially with an express shipping option. I trusted your timeline and paid a premium for fast delivery, yet I remain without my order or any reliable estimate of when it will ship. 
 
 At this point, I request: 
 
 
 A clear and final update on the shipment status. 
 If the item is not ready for immediate dispatch, I kindly ask for a full refund, including the express shipping fee. 
 
 
 
 I would appreciate a prompt and definitive answer, as this delay is unacceptable for any e-commerce platform offering international service. 
 
 Sincerely, 
 Sebastião de Sena Ferreira

Dear SIMSONN team, 
 
 Thank you for your reply and for finally shipping my order. However, I must express my continued disappointment with how this situation has been handled. 
 
 First, I was clearly promised a refund of the express shipping fee (USD 59.90) as compensation for the delay. As of today, I have not received any confirmation or refund regarding this. 
 
 Second, the package was not shipped using express service as initially paid for. The tracking information shows it is being handled by Correios, indicating that a standard international shipping method was used instead. This directly contradicts the service I selected and paid extra for. 
 
 At this point, I expect two things: 
 
 
 A full refund of the express shipping fee, as previously promised. 
 A written confirmation of this refund, including the timeline for the amount to be processed. 
 
 
 
 I trusted your store and paid extra for a faster delivery experience, and unfortunately, the reality has fallen short of what was offered and agreed upon. 
 
 I hope this matter can now be resolved properly. 
 
 Sincerely, 
 Sebastião de Sena Ferreira
